VPSCorner has a 10% offer for all Low End Talk customers. The offer works on all packages that we have. Our packages start from $4.99 on our website http://vpscorner.co.uk and the code is LET-10OFF.

VPSCorner is UK Based and has nodes in Moldova. The only issue we've ever had since we started was when three nodes were down for 24hrs due to a kernel issue, we issued all customers affected a full months credit in compensation for the 24hrs down time (our only ever down time) and we had zero data loss. We paid a significant sum for this issue to be resolved without issue to techs who billed per 30minutes.

Please also note that we offer a large variety of images for our customers to choose from including VNC/GUI images as well as a pre-secured VPSCorner image. We can also assist with installing some scripts but please check first, it depends on how long it will take etc.

On to the offer. Our offer will give you 10% off all packages. Our packages and specifications as well as other misc details can be viewed below:

- Instant Setup
- Bitcoin Accepted
- Paypal Accepted
- SolusVM
- OpenVZ
- IPV6 & IPV4

![](http://oi39.tinypic.com/2lac55y.jpg)

Overall, we provide a  high quality service to all users and offer excellent support. If something is legal, we are very likely to permit it. We have lots of users with lots of miscellaneous requirements. If you want to host something but aren't to sure please open a support ticket and we will tell you.

You can visit us and use the coupon/offer code provided in the first paragraph at http://vpscorner.co.uk
